text: Sari achaee mashriq-o-maghrib ki taraf mun kerney mein hi nahi bulkay acha woh shaks hai jo Allah Taalaa per qayamat kay din per aur farishton per kitab ullah per aur nabiyon per eman rakhney wala ho jo maal say mohabbat kerney kay bawajood qarabat daron yateemon miskeenon musafiron aur sawal kerney walon ko dey ghulamon ko aazad keray namaz ki pabandi aur zakat ki adaeegi keray jab wada keray tab ussay poora keray tangdast dukh dard aur laraee kay waqt sabar keray yehi sachay log hain aur yehi perhezgar hain
